summary: While recovering from an assassination attempt four days before his coronation, a stern prince is replaced by a romantic lookalike.
cast: Salman Khan|Sonam Kapoor|Neil Nitin Mukesh|Deepak Dobriyal|Arman Kohli|Swara Bhaskar|Aashika Bhatia|Deep Raj Rana|Manoj Joshi|Sanjay Mishra|Samaira Rao|Anupam Kher|Suhasini Mulay|Sameer Dharmadhikari|Prem Khan|Lata Sabharwal|Karuna Pandey|Namrata Thapa|Brijendra Kala|V.M. Badola|Mukesh Bhatt|Gurpal Singh|Sucheta Khanna|Bikramjeet Kanwarpal|Aaradhna Uppal|S.M. title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
